text: The 2006/07 NTFL season was the 86th season of the Northern Territory Football League (NTFL). Southern Districts Crocs have won there 2nd premiership title while defeating Waratah in the grand final by 9 points. ==Grand Final== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left;" |- style="background:#efefef;" ! Premiers ! GF Score ! Runner-up |- | Southern Districts | 13.12 (90) - 11.15 (81) | Waratah |} ==References== Category:Northern Territory Football League seasons NTFL
title: 2006–07 NTFL season
